text.author: Kelly Link
text.title: Strange Things Happen - Water Off a Black Dog's Back
text.summary: Jellicoh College student Rachel Rook speaks with her boyfriend Carroll, whom she met a few months earlier at Jellicoh College library where he works, about meeting her parents for the first time on the farm where they live together.
